message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a high-quality item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. It's a great deal for a product of this quality, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to meet you halfway, so how about $150?
